metadata.title: CVE-2024-44331 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect Access Control in GStreamer RTSP server 1.25.0 ingst-rtsp-server/rtsp-media.c allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice via a series of specially crafted hexstream requests.

criterions.comment: gst-rtsp-server1.0 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
